<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<!-- Top Row: Profile Image + Info --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:spacing="10dp">
<!-- Profile Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/applicant_image" android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:src="@drawable/applicant" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="Profile" android:layout_marginEnd="10dp" />
<!-- Text Content Column --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Name + New Badge Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:spacing="6dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/applicant_name" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Name" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/new_badge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="New" android:textSize="8sp" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/chip_blue" app:chipStrokeColor="@color/chip_blue" app:chipStrokeWidth="0dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/applicant_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Title" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" android:layout_marginTop="3dp" />
<!-- Applied Date --> <TextView android:id="@+id/applied_date" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Applied on..." android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="1" android:layout_marginTop="3dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Chevron Icon --> <ImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" android:contentDescription="Details" android:tint="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginStart="10dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<Space android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="10dp" />
<!-- Bottom Row: Favorite + Interview --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="end" android:spacing="8dp">
<!-- Favorite Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/favorite_btn" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_star" android:contentDescription="Favorite" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:tint="@android:color/darker_gray" android:scaleType="centerInside" />
<!-- Interview Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/interview_btn" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="Interview" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="6dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/button_blue" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
